original_text: After he had finished all his sayings in the hearing of the people, he entered Capernaum.
korean_text: 예수께서 모든 말씀을 백성에게 들려 주시기를 마치신 후에 가버나움으로 들어가시니라

sentences.original_text: After he had finished all his sayings in the hearing of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성들이 듣는 가운데 그의 모든 말씀을 마치신 후에,
